alert.note: Alert for Surprise Valley California (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:23PM PST until January 14 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches except locally higher amounts 3 to 6 inches in far northern Washoe County and Surprise Valley. Winds gusting 35 to 45 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph in wind prone areas along NV-447 and Modoc County Highway 1. * WHERE...In California, Surprise Valley California. In Nevada, Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads may become slick and blowing snow may cause lower visibility while driving. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
